CustomField.description: Created this field to return the Amendment Quantity
CustomField.formula:
IF ( AND( ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c), ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c), For_Renewal__c = TRUE), Quantity, /*New products added from Pricebook*/
IF( AND( ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c), NOT(ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c)), For_Renewal__c = TRUE),Quantity, /*New product added to upsell got merged to the Quote*/
IF( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c)), For_Renewal__c = TRUE, Quantity <> Renewal_OLI_ID__r.Quantity), Quantity - Renewal_OLI_ID__r.Quantity, /*Renewal Product quantity increased/decreased on Quote through as upsell*/
IF ( AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Renewal_OLI_ID__c)), /*Product quantity increased/decreased on Quote line items*/ ISBLANK(Upsell_OLI_ID__c), For_Renewal__c = TRUE, Quantity <> Renewal_OLI_ID__r.Quantity ), Quantity - Renewal_OLI_ID__r.Quantity,0))))
CustomField.label: Conga Amendment Quantity
